programme.title: The Story of Formula E
programme.desc: Ontdek hoe de Formule E tot stand gekomen is. In 2012 ontstond het idee voor een elektrisch aangedreven autosportklasse. Het eerste kampioenschap vond plaats in het seizoen 2014-2015, terwijl in 2013 enkele demonstratie-evenementen werden gehouden.

programme.title: The Story of Formula E
programme.desc: In 2012 werden de eerste plannen gemaakt om een elektrisch aangedreven autosportklasse op te richten. In 2013 werden demonstratie-evenementen gehouden waardoor in 2014-2015 het eerste kampioenschap gehouden kon worden.

programme.title: Storie di GP: Canada 1991
programme.desc: E' la quinta prova del 1991. Sul circuito di Montreal, intitolato a Gilles Villneuve, Patrese con la Williams-Renault e' in pole position, seguito dal suo compagno di scuderia Nigel Mansell.

programme.title: Canada 1997 - F1
programme.desc: Canada 1997 - F1 - La F1 fa tappa a Montreal per la 7a prova della stagione '97. Shumacher con la Ferrari ha conquistato la pole position e parte davanti a Villeneuve che gioca in casa.

programme.title: GP Canada 2007
programme.desc: GP Canada 2007 - Sesta tappa del mondiale di F1. Sulla griglia di partenza davanti a tutti ci sono le McLaren di Hamilton e Alonso. Quarta e quinta invece le Ferrari di Raikkonen e Massa.

programme.title: Top Rank Boxing on ESPN

programme.title: College Baseball

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Hunter Dobbins (2-1, 4.06) held the Angels to one run in five innings on June 2, seeking his first win since April 18; Carlos Rodon (8-3, 2.49) is 7-0 with a 1.27 ERA in his last nine starts, including a 4-0 record and a 0.72 ERA in his last four.

programme.desc: Rajah Caruth secured his first win of the season with his victory at Nashville over points leader Corey Heim, his eighth podium finish of 2025; Truck Series races at Michigan for the first time since Zane Smith won in 2020 over Christian Eckes.

programme.title: ARCA Racing
programme.desc: Austin Green secured his first Menards Series win of his career with his victory at Charlotte over Grant Enfinger; Connor Zilisch averaged 149.44 en route to his win at Michigan last year, beating eventual 2024 champion Andres Perez by 0.701 seconds.

programme.desc: The tournament, which features a $9,800,000 purse, debuted in 1904 and was won by England's Jack Oke; Robert MacIntyre became the first Scotsman to win the event in 98 years with his one-shot victory over American Ben Griffin in last year's edition.
